ygData.subject: I agree
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with what you said about why not stay in the guild. That is what I am going to do. Alomst everyone in the guild is decked out in good armor. At least
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with what you said about why not stay in the guild. That is what I am
going to do. Alomst everyone in the guild is decked out in good armor. At
least everyone I have seen has at least one piece of chainmail. I am not sure
how to make 10 plat real quick, but the guild idea, is very good. Just stay
in the guild. Best way to go, and you will be remembered. Whether it is for
bad or good is up to you. Sorry I came off the wrong way on my last mail. My
fault. Just wasn't sure, shouldn't have answered, did anyway. Ooops.
